segments.text: Sit down , please . Maybe you have read the contract , but I want to give you the details again before you sign the contract . You must have a three-month internship .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you become a permanent employee , you will have the insurances . You will get monthly pay and will be on eight-hour / day work shift .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait , will I have five insurances and one fund ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . You can also enjoy legal holidays and year-end bonus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you need to work overtime , you will get twice the usual salary as overtime pay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have read the relevant terms of the contract . Do you have other questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long will the induction training be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you don't have other questions , just sign here .
segments.speaker: S1
